name: Eyedea Lab
overview:
Eyedea Lab is a Multimedia, Web development and Graphics Design Company in Kolkata, India.

Eyedea Lab is working for the past 8 years with a notable client list ranging from corporates to individuals, satisfying them with quality jobs. Most of the business comes through existing clients and referrals.

Two Multimedia Professionals Rana Majumder and Priyanka Naskar Majumder who leads the production team for the following services i.e Graphics Design and Web development respectively are the owners of Eyedea Lab.

Collectively the services they presently offer are - Web design and development, Web consulting, Digital content creation, Corporate Presentation, Graphics design.

They work with clients from both India and abroad.
